name: network-account-compare
description: CLI tool to compare network account configurations

scripts.mainnet: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e mainnet
scripts.testnet: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e testnet
scripts.stagenet: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e stagenet
scripts.devnet-us: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e devnetUs
scripts.devnet-apac: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e devnetApac
scripts.local: npm run build && node dist/index.js -e local
